item.title: The Straussian Moment - Peter Thiel (pdf)
item.description: The Straussian Moment - Peter Thiel (pdf) This was strangely hard to find and only available as pictures on Evernote, so I uploaded it as a searchable PDF. Peter Robinson also has a great interview with Thiel on his essay.
